enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Only students in the MSJ program may enroll in these classes
title: JOUR JOUR 406-0-20 News Graphics and Design

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Course covers cross-platform design. Students create visual journalism. The goal is to develop fundamental skills needed to design print and digital content. Through weekly hands-on workshop exercises, students gain an understanding of design concepts. Students learn how to choose typefaces according to the readership and publication, the impact of color on perception and behavior, and how to tell engaging stories people via design.

subject: JOUR
